name: Gen0Sec WAF Rule Generation MCP Server
description: Generate WAF rules and provide context information about WAF rules. Supports multiple CVE data sources including Nuclei Open Source and Nuclei Paid (ProjectDiscovery API).

python_path.title: Path to Python executable
python_path.description: Path to the Python executable (python3 or python). Defaults to 'python3'.

workspace_directory.title: Workspace directory
workspace_directory.description: Optional workspace directory for the server.

validation_api_url.title: WAF validation API URL
validation_api_url.description: Full path to the WAF validation API URL. This value is passed as WAF_VALIDATION_API_URL environment variable and takes precedence over config.yaml when running as MCP extension.

nuclei_opensource_enabled.title: Enable Nuclei Open Source plugin
nuclei_opensource_enabled.description: Enable the Nuclei Open Source plugin which fetches CVE templates from the free GitHub repository.

nuclei_opensource_priority.title: Nuclei Open Source priority
nuclei_opensource_priority.description: Priority for the Nuclei Open Source plugin. Lower numbers are checked first. Default: 100.

nuclei_templates_version.title: Nuclei templates version
nuclei_templates_version.description: Version tag of nuclei-templates to download (e.g., v10.3.5). Ignored if nuclei_templates_auto_update is enabled.

nuclei_templates_auto_update.title: Auto-update nuclei templates
nuclei_templates_auto_update.description: If enabled, automatically downloads the latest nuclei-templates release from GitHub.

projectdiscovery_enabled.title: Enable ProjectDiscovery plugin
projectdiscovery_enabled.description: Enable the ProjectDiscovery plugin which fetches CVE data from the ProjectDiscovery API. Requires an API key.

projectdiscovery_api_key.title: ProjectDiscovery API Key
projectdiscovery_api_key.description: Your ProjectDiscovery API key for accessing premium vulnerability data. Get your key at https://cloud.projectdiscovery.io/

projectdiscovery_priority.title: ProjectDiscovery priority
projectdiscovery_priority.description: Priority for the ProjectDiscovery plugin. Lower numbers are checked first. Default: 50 (higher priority than open source).
